archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.2.2f: f) details of any monitoring activities to be performed (e.g. individuals' network usage, acquisition of cloud services or their access to sensitive files) to detect malicious activity or accidental leakage of sensitive information.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
